sentences.english: Its Tochigi and Iwaki plants, north of Tokyo, would remain shut until Friday.
sentences.chinese: 位於東京北部櫪木和磐城的工廠將停產至週五。

sentences.english: What most is exasperating , I order this model of new car, already suspended production at present.
sentences.chinese: 最氣人的是，我訂購的這款新車，目前已經停產。

sentences.english: Four years after production stopped, the sight and sound of the GT is still breathtaking.
sentences.chinese: 停產4年後，GT的“音容笑貌”仍舊牽動我心。

sentences.english: Jigang will fix this problem during the recent shut down of the finishing mill.
sentences.chinese: 濟鋼會在最近的精軋機停產時解決這一問題。

sentences.english: Production at the LDV plant ceased 10 months ago.
sentences.chinese: LDV的工廠已於10個月前停產。

sentences.english: For workers, the shutdowns and job losses are devastating.
sentences.chinese: 對於工人來說，停產和裁員是災難性的。

sentences.english: Conoco says they are 3% of its annual output.
sentences.chinese: 康菲方面說，停產油田佔其年產量的3%。

sentences.english: There is heavy damage in a shut - down of natural gas purification unit without planning.
sentences.chinese: 天然氣淨化裝置的計劃外停產損失重大。

sentences.english: Adjust current or transmission speed and, when necessary, shall be discontinued.
sentences.chinese: 調整電流或傳動速度，必要時須停產。

sentences.english: Most worldwide manufacturers of floppies already put thekibosh on the little
sentences.chinese: 全球大部分軟盤製造商已經停產。

sentences.english: Many of the closures were plants with daily capacity below 1,000 tonnes.
sentences.chinese: 很多停產工廠的日加工能力都在1，000噸以下。

sentences.english: Across the world carmakers are mothballing factories and dropping shifts.
sentences.chinese: 全世界的汽車工廠都面臨停產或減產。

sentences.english: This can lead to the cut-off of supply of nutrients to the area.
sentences.chinese: 這會導致停產的供應養分到該地區。

sentences.english: The paper gives a modification plan for changing the product from ethylene glycol to ethylene oxide from the plant.
sentences.chinese: 制定了停產乙二醇，改產環氧乙烷的改造方案。

sentences.english: The steel factory was ordered to halt production after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 事故發生後，港陸公司被責令停產整頓。

sentences.english: Several major battery manufacturers with shares traded in China have issued notices saying production is suspended.
sentences.chinese: 行動中，幾家上市的大電池廠都被勒令停產。

definition: to be overdue/to exceed the time limit/to expire (as in expiration date)
to cease trading (temporarily or permanently)/to close down
model (particular version of a manufactured article)/type (product specification in terms of color, size etc)
to sell off/to get rid of in a sale
to appreciate (in value)/to increase in price
